duties_responsibilities.duty: Train, develop, coach, and mentor Admissions Directors and Representatives on admissions, performance management, staff development, and leadership.
Conduct weekly regional team conference calls and training.
Review staffing and marketing plans and provide feedback and directives to Directors.
Monitor compliance throughout the assigned territory and facilitate multi-campus applicant pools.
Act as a liaison between the field and Executive/Corporate Campus leadership.
Attend and complete all training for this position, as required by the company.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree required; master's degree preferred
